sentence.Network_en: In the daisy family the numerous bracts which subtend the inflorescence are known as an involucre.
sentence.Network_cn: 在菊科植物中,苞片数目多而聚生在花序外围,称为总苞.

list.abs: ... . . .在外观上混为一体而类似小穗但此实为一复合性的构造物其下方属于小枝的部分之苞片腋内常有小枝芽[此时该苞片称具芽苞片(bud-subtending bract)]如果此腋芽发育则可成长为次生假小穗后者的腋芽也有可能发育成另一再生的假小穗如此重复最后可形.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in sense 1): from Latin subtendere, from sub- 'under' + tendere 'stretch'. Sense 2 dates from the late 19th cent

means.word_mean: 1. be opposite to; of angles and sides, in geometry
